name: Monster Truck Stunt Rider Race - Legends Offroad 2016
name_original: Monster Truck Stunt Rider Race - Legends Offroad 2016
description:
Top free Monster Truck adventurous driving game to become the 4x4 offroad racing legend. Race

Monster Truck through challenging tracks and prove that you are the most fast, intense and

competitive off-road rider. If you like 4X4 Monster Truck racing games then test your real

driving skills and challenge your friends by achieving best scores. High speed 4X4 racing

adventures with race, jump crash and stunt actions.
Drive your monster truck carefully and quickly on the way to cross each track. Collect all coins

while crossing all hurdles with fastest time. Drive your monster truck in fast racing action by

crossing obstacles with drum mayhem to reach at finish state with least possible time by getting

medals. Get atleast one medal to complete each level. Level complexity increases in next levels.

This monster truck simulator will provide you the opportunity to drive 4 extreme and colorful

bigfoots and prove your driver skills such as courage, attention, and responsibility.

Features:
• High quality 3D beautiful stunning graphics
• Best adventures of 4X4 real offroad driving
• Unique challenging 40 levels
• Attractive and addictive game play environment
• Amazing realistic 3D environment
• Colorful heavy Monster trucks with different physics for a great gameplay experience
• Lifelike visuals to perform real life stunts
• Easy and smooth realistic controls
